name: Broken Sword: The Lost Sword of the Ancients
name_original: Broken Sword: The Lost Sword of the Ancients
description:
Broken Sword: The Lost Sword of the Ancients is a platformer game developed by nategamedev. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play Broken Sword: The Lost Sword of the Ancients on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
